units.title: TRACK3R
units.subtitle: Problem-Solving Multi-Purpose Trackerbot
units.description: TRACK3R is easy to create & command and has a lot of tools. Use the Bi-blade Blender, Blasting Bazooka, Gripping Claw, and Heavy Hammer to complete different missions on the Mission Pad.

activities.title: TRACK3R 01
activities.subtitle: Blend It with Precision
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll use the Bi-blade Blender to remove a tire from the Mission Pad.

activities.title: TRACK3R 02
activities.subtitle: Blast It Away
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll blast away tires with the Blasting Bazooka.

activities.title: TRACK3R 03
activities.subtitle: Take Them Away
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll move two tires with the Gripping Claw and place them inside the squares on the Mission Pad.

activities.title: TRACK3R 04
activities.subtitle: Tactical Defence System
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll create a Tactical Defence System using the Heavy Hammer to protect TRACK3R from ambushes from behind.

activities.title: TRACK3R 05
activities.subtitle: Time Trial
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll command TRACK3R with the Remote Infrared Beacon to pass through all the checkpoints on the Mission Pad before the time runs out!

units.title: SPIK3R
units.subtitle: Fast, Agile, and Very Clever Scorpionbot
units.description: SPIK3R is a complex robot that crawls and turns to search for targets. It can attack with its Crushing Claws or shoot with its Lightning Tail.

activities.title: SPIK3R 01
activities.subtitle: Lightning Tail
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll shoot a ball with the Lightning Tail.

activities.title: SPIK3R 02
activities.subtitle: Crawling Manoeuvres
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll make a crawling manoeuvre and perform a long-range attack.

activities.title: SPIK3R 03
activities.subtitle: Crush It!
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll add the Crushing Claws and perform a close-range attack.

activities.title: SPIK3R 04
activities.subtitle: Wait for It…
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll make SPIK3R crawl around in place and wait until it detects something to attack.

activities.title: SPIK3R 05
activities.subtitle: Catch That Bug
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll hunt the Bug and take it out with a long-range shot before moving in to finish the job with the Crushing Claws.

units.title: EV3RSTORM
units.subtitle: Intelligent Humanoid Smartbot
units.description: EV3RSTORM moves around on tracked skates and can attack with its Spinning Tri-blade or Blasting Bazooka. It can detect objects, follow the Remote Infrared Beacon, and receive commands remotely.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 01
activities.subtitle: Driving and Turning
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll drive and turn EV3RSTORM.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 02
activities.subtitle: Activate!
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll press the Touch Sensor to activate EV3RSTORM or put it back to sleep.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 03
activities.subtitle: Stay Out of the Dark
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll make clever use of the Colour Sensor so EV3RSTORM stays out of the dark and attacks with the Spinning Tri-blade using the Touch Sensor.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 04
activities.subtitle: Attack on Sight
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll attack with the Spinning Tri-blade when something comes too close.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 05
activities.subtitle: Command and Blast
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll control EV3RSTORM remotely with the Remote Infrared Beacon and shoot with the Blasting Bazooka using the Touch Sensor and the Colour Sensor.

activities.title: EV3RSTORM 06
activities.subtitle: Search and Destroy
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll search for Wheeler using the Infrared Sensor to aim and shoot with the Blasting Bazooka.

units.title: R3PTAR
units.subtitle: Super-Fast Snakebot
units.description: R3PTAR is a tall, long, and powerful robot. It moves like a real snake and can strike with its Fearsome Fangs when it detects something.

activities.title: R3PTAR 01
activities.subtitle: Slither like a Snake
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll make a slithering movement like a real snake.

activities.title: R3PTAR 02
activities.subtitle: Rattling R3PTAR
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll make R3PTAR rattle and wait until it detects something to strike with its Fearsome Fangs.

activities.title: R3PTAR 03
activities.subtitle: Hunting
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll enable R3PTAR to slither around by itself and strike with its Fearsome Fangs when it detects something.

activities.title: R3PTAR 04
activities.subtitle: Take Control
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll use the Remote Infrared Beacon to control R3PTAR remotely.

units.title: GRIPP3R
units.subtitle: Super-Strong All-Terrain Musclebot
units.description: GRIPP3R is a strong robot that can lift and carry heavy things with its Grasping Grippers. Control it remotely to make it pick up what you want!

activities.title: GRIPP3R 01
activities.subtitle: Grasping It
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll practice using the Grasping Grippers.

activities.title: GRIPP3R 02
activities.subtitle: Moving Around the Tire Stack
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll drive, pick up the Tire Stack, turn around, and put it down again.

activities.title: GRIPP3R 03
activities.subtitle: Pick That Up!
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll use the Infrared Sensor to show GRIPP3R what objects you want it to pick up or put down.

activities.title: GRIPP3R 04
activities.subtitle: At Your Service!
activities.description: In this mission, you’ll use the Remote Infrared Beacon to control GRIPP3R remotely so you can carry around things as you please.
